value:
select 
cast(company as varchar(1000)) as company_name,
cast(codigo_ramo as varchar(1000)) as codigo_ramo,
cast(ramo_plan as varchar(1000)) as ramo_plan,
cast(agno as int) as year,
cast(mes as int) as month,
cast('Y' as char(1)) as actv_rec_ind,
LKP.MAX_SID
from
cdp_stg_dwh.stg_ramo_plan
LEFT JOIN (SELECT 1 as DUMMY, max(dim_pln_ramo_key ) AS MAX_SID from cdp_dwh.dim_pln_ramo_plan_t) LKP
ON LKP.DUMMY=1 
where year is not null and month is not null;
